author: mpoeschl
msg: resolveEntity must not throw an IOException as the DefaultHandler method only throws SAXEception
(while the sun compiler accepts this in eclipse i get an error)
so we catch the IOException and throw a SAXException

author: henning
msg: Clean up all the value generating templates for data load. They now simply
ask the model whether a column should be escaped and use the escaped value

author: henning
msg: Give the data container a method which returns the escaped value of
a field. Make sure, that ticks inside a string are properly escaped.

author: henning
msg: Let our model know, which columns need ticks around its value. In an
ideal world, we would be able to ask the database adapter, but Torque
isn't that good. Use the same heuristics as in the data load templates.
